GSD.product_version: versions from v5.3 to before v5.10.43
GSD.description:
netfilter: nft_ct: skip expectations for confirmed conntrack

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.43 by commit 5f3429c05e4028a0e241afdad856dd15dec2ffb9, it was introduced in version v5.3 by commit 857b46027d6f91150797295752581b7155b9d0e1. For more details please see the references link.
